Uses of Class
org.fluentjdbc.DbContextSelectBuilder

  • Packages that use DbContextSelectBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.fluentjdbc  

    • Uses of DbContextSelectBuilder in org.fluentjdbc

      Methods in org.fluentjdbc that return DbContextSelectBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbContextSelectBuilder.orderBy​(String orderByClause)
      Adds ORDER BY ... clause to the SELECT statement
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbTableContext.orderedBy​(String orderByClause)
      Creates a DbTableContext.query() ready for list-operations with ORDER BY ... clause
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbContextSelectBuilder.query()
      Returns this.
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbTableContext.query()
      Creates a DbContextSelectBuilder which allows you to query the table by generating "SELECT ..." statements
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbContextSelectBuilder.unordered()
      If you haven't called orderBy(java.lang.String), the results of list(RowMapper) will be unpredictable.
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbTableContext.unordered()
      Creates a DbTableContext.query() ready for list-operations without any ORDER BY clause
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbContextSelectBuilder.whereAll​(List<String> fields, List<Object> values)
      For each field adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbTableContext.whereAll​(List<String> fields, List<Object> values)
      Creates a DbTableContext.query() and for each field adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbContextSelectBuilder.whereExpression​(String expression)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbContextSelectBuilder.whereExpression​(String expression, Object value)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and the value to the parameter list.
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbTableContext.whereExpression​(String expression)
      Creates a DbTableContext.query() and adds the expression to the WHERE-clause
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbTableContext.whereExpression​(String expression, Object value)
      Creates a DbTableContext.query() and adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and the value to the parameter list.
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbContextSelectBuilder.whereExpressionWithMultipleParameters​(String expression, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and all the values to the parameter list.
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbTableContext.whereExpressionWithMultipleParameters​(String expression, Collection<?> parameters)
      Creates a DbTableContext.query() and adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and all the values to the parameter list.
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbContextSelectBuilder.whereIn​(String fieldName, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName in (?, ?, ?)" to the query.
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbTableContext.whereIn​(String fieldName, Collection<?> parameters)
      Creates a DbTableContext.query() and adds "WHERE fieldName in (?, ?, ?)".
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbContextSelectBuilder.whereOptional​(String fieldName, Object value)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query unless value is null
      DbContextSelectBuilder DbTableContext.whereOptional​(String fieldName, Object value)
      Creates a DbTableContext.query() and adds "WHERE fieldName = value" unless value is null
